subject: Officiating (Sports)
Instant Replay (Sports)
Playoff Games
Television
Football
lead_paragraph: Mike Pereira, a former N.F.L. side judge and vice president for league officiating who critiques officiating crews on Fox Sports, said the Packers should have been charged with a fumble.
snippet: Mike Pereira, a former N.F.L. side judge and vice president for league officiating who critiques officiating crews on Fox Sports, said the Packers should have been charged with a fumble.
